Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We also show that in all informative carrier father to affected child transmissions , with the notable exception of the premutation carrier , the expansion size decreases . .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| premutation carrier |

The only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is "premutation carrier".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| premutation carrier |

The only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is "premutation carrier". Other terms such as "carrier father" and "affected child" refer to the status or condition of the individuals, not to a specific disease.
